Direct Known Subclasses:
CalendarPanel
public class TGrid
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Grid

An extension of Grid that does not put an   inside a cell when it is cleared. This is a temporary fix until this same fix is made in the GWT Grid component, or may become a permanant addition to the GWT-WL if this change is not made in the Grid.

Author:
rhanson
